scripts.preinstall: cd express-openapi-validate && npm install && npm run build && grpc_tools_node_protoc --js_out=import_style=commonjs,binary:. --grpc_out=grpc_js:. proto/api.proto
scripts.prestart: cd ajv && npm run build && cd ../express-openapi-validate && npm run build && cd .. && npm update ajv && npm update express-openapi-validate
